content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello, Hassan. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm happy to discuss the rental price for the apartment. How much are you considering to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I believe the market rate for similar apartments in the area is around $2,000 per month. However, I am a student and I'm looking for a fair deal. Can we negotiate a lower price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: As a landlord, I'm always open to fair negotiations. What price did you have in mind that you believe would be fair for both parties?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Considering my budget as a student and the size of the apartment, I was hoping we could agree on a price around $1,700 per month. This would help me manage my expenses while still being able to afford a nice place to live. Would this be a price that you could consider?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Your offer of $1,700 per month is quite reasonable, considering the size of the apartment and your status as a student. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a small concession on my part. If you are willing to sign a one-year lease, I could agree to your offer of $1,700 per month. Would this be acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine
